Question: noco-noco Pte. Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
noco-noco Pte. Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight

- RCTnm devices integrating high-value-added batteries with X-SEPA™ technology and distributed edge control technology
- RCTnm devices enable energy management, decentralization, and smart city realization
- Devices feature TESNOLOGY's 'DI-Engine' for data security and democratization without cloud infrastructure reliance
- Batteries transform into information and energy management hubs, optimizing electricity consumption and empowering citizens
- Batteries equipped with X-SEPA™ technology exceed 2,000 cycles at 60℃, showcasing extended lifespan and high temperature resistance

For more information, visit www.noco-noco.com.
